item.title: Hell's Revenge 4x4 Off-Roading Tour from Moab
item.description: Roam over the sandstone domes and slickrock ledges of Hell's Revenge near Moab on this off-road adventure by utility terrain vehicle. Hop aboard your Kawasaki Teryx 4, opting to drive or join as a passenger. Then, navigate the dramatic terrain, full of steep climbs and descents. You’re treated to views of the La Sal Mountains, the Colorado River and the sandstone cliffs of Echo Canyon.

image.alt: Hell's Revenge 4x4 Off-Roading Tour from Moab

item.title: Arches National Park 4x4 Adventure from Moab
item.description: To truly experience the legendary beauty of Arches National Park, you need to explore its isolated corners. On this adventurous 4WD tour from Moab, your expert guide will help you do just that as you navigate the backcountry to spots like the Tower Arch, as well as visit the famous red rocks at Marching Men and Eye of the Whale. Bonus: Your tour features a stop to see fossilized dinosaur tracks.

image.alt: Arches National Park 4x4 Adventure from Moab

item.title: Monument Valley Tour
item.description: Explore the magnificent formations of Monument Valley with a local Navajo guide. You’ll travel by open-air vehicle through this iconic landscape along backcountry routes and restricted areas. The excursion covers sites such as the Mitten Buttes, John Ford's Point, Yeibichai, Three Sisters Spires, and Sun Eyes Arch and a live Navajo musical performance.

image.alt: Monument Valley Tour

item.title: 2.5 Hours of Monument Valley's Backcountry 4×4 Tour
item.description: Explore Monument Valley Navajo Tribal Park on this tour that introduces you to Monument Valley's major scenic attractions. During the journey, see backcountry monuments, which include arches and ancient petroglyphs from the Anasazi people. Select a morning or afternoon departure time when booking.

image.alt: 2.5 Hours of Monument Valley's Backcountry 4×4 Tour

item.title: Peekaboo Slot Canyon UTV and Hiking Adventure
item.description: Peekaboo Slot Canyon is one of southern Utah's most incredible pathways through the area's famous red rock. We'll drive you there on a thrilling ATV ride starting in a private canyon. Soon you'll be marveling at the stunning landscape of the Grand Staircase and walking through the beauty of a narrow red rock canyon with 100 ft tall walls. Whatever your age, this is an awe-inspiring experience.

image.alt: Peekaboo Slot Canyon UTV and Hiking Adventure

item.title: Award Winning UTV Slot Canyon Tour
item.description: Explore the slot canyons of East Zion and ride to and from the canyons in a Can Am UTV during this adventure tour. Our guides drive you in the UTV, so you can sit back and enjoy this exciting off-road experience. Traverse rough terrain to reach the canyons then wander around on foot to explore the deepest parts of these remote areas. Be sure to bring a camera for frame-worthy photos.

image.alt: Award Winning UTV Slot Canyon Tour

item.title: Salt Lake City Guided Bus Tour
item.description: Go sightseeing in Salt Lake City with ease on this bus tour. You’ll see some of Utah's top urban attractions like the Mormon Trail, Temple Square, the State Capitol Building, Old Fort Douglas and sites from the 2002 Winter Olympic Games. Hear stories of the pioneers, the Mormon religion, and historical anecdotes. A highlight of the tour is witnessing the 12,000 pipes of the famous Salt Lake Tabernacle organ.

image.alt: Salt Lake City Guided Bus Tour

item.title: Canyonlands National Park Half-Day Tour from Moab
item.description: On this half-day 4WD adventure from Moab, explore the rugged, red stone interior of Canyonlands National Park, where you’ll experience the beauty of the Island in the Sky district and the stunning Gooseneck Overlook. Your professional guide will navigate your vehicle down the switchbacks of White Rim Road, where you will not only see the remains of ancient Pueblo civilizations, but also admire the canyon walls that drop 1,000 feet (300m) down. It’s an easy drive from Moab to Canyonlands, and the views of the meandering Colorado River help cap off this Utah adventure.

image.alt: Canyonlands National Park Half-Day Tour from Moab

item.title: You-Drive Tour: 4X4 Experience at Hell's Revenge with Fins&Things
item.description: Take an adventurous ride into the sunset on a UTV (similar to an ATV) on the Hell's Revenge Trail. You’ll pass petrified sand dunes and get the chance to take in great views of the surrounding canyons and rock formations as you zip over rough and slick terrains. Best of all, you'll get to experience the thrill of driving yourself.

image.alt: You-Drive Tour: 4X4 Experience at Hell's Revenge with Fins&Things

item.title: East Zion Crimson Canyon Hike & UTV Adventure
item.description: Experience the beauty of Slot Canyons without the crowds on this small-group tour near Zion National Park. In an off-road UTV vehicle, you'll journey into the rugged backcountry, and to a private access area few visitors reach. Led by an experienced guide, hike into the slot canyon and conquer climbing obstacles reaching 10 feet high, while admiring the towering sandstone walls.

image.alt: East Zion Crimson Canyon Hike & UTV Adventure

item.title: Peek-A-Boo Slot Canyon Tour UTV Adventure (Private)
item.description: Journey into Slot Canyon in a UTV that can tackle the sandy trails. This private tour takes you to an off-the-beaten-path location far from the crowds of Zion's most-visited areas. Upon arrival, you'll take a short hike into the canyon where your guide will tell you all about its geology and history. Afterward, there's time for some optional sandboarding fun.

image.alt: Peek-A-Boo Slot Canyon Tour UTV Adventure (Private)

item.title: Scenic Tour of Bryce Canyon
item.description: See the best of Utah’s Bryce Canyon National Park on a small-group tour excursion. Set off for an adventure through the rugged landscapes and unique spires with a seasoned guide and an air-conditioned vehicle. Discover key sites in the park and learn about the wildlife, history, and geology of Bryce Canyon.

image.alt: Scenic Tour of Bryce Canyon

item.title: Moab's Most Xtreme 3-Hour Experience on Hell's Revenge
item.description: Adventure-seeking travelers will love this three-hour extreme experience. You'll venture along some of the most rugged trails in the Moab Desert in a tough ATV with a roll cage, five-point harnesses, and bucket seats. You'll be safe and secure while enjoying the thrilling ride through rocky canyons, along cliff tops, up steep hills, and past some of the most amazing desert features.

image.alt: Moab's Most Xtreme 3-Hour Experience on Hell's Revenge

item.title: 2.5 Hour U-Drive-Guided Hell's Revenge UTV Tour
item.description: Experience Utah’s thrilling Hell’s Revenge Trail on a UTV with this excursion. Join a small group and traverse steep climbs and slick rock as you head to your destination—the Colorado River Overlook. From the top, gaze over at Arches National Park and the surrounding desert before heading back to the starting point.

image.alt: 2.5 Hour U-Drive-Guided Hell's Revenge UTV Tour

item.title: East Zion 4 Hour Slot Canyon Canyoneering UTV Tour
item.description: Adventure-loving travelers will enjoy the opportunity to hike, canyoneer, rappel, and travel in a UTV through some of the most amazing slot canyons in the East Zion area. Be immersed in the incredible landscapes of this national park while having fun and enjoying the views. Receive personalized guidance on a small-group tour with a maximum of ten participants.

image.alt: East Zion 4 Hour Slot Canyon Canyoneering UTV Tour

item.title: Thrilling Guided You-Drive Hells Revenge UTV Tour In Moab UT
item.description: Enjoy an intrepid, one-of-a-kind excursion through Moab’s dramatic scenery and Slickrock Trail on this guided all-terrain vehicle tour. Pick between multiple convenient tour times, and make your own way to the departure point in central Moab. Once you get acquainted with your ATV and your gear, follow your guide up steep inclines, big descents, and keep one eye on the striking landscapes as you go.

image.alt: Thrilling Guided You-Drive Hells Revenge UTV Tour In Moab UT

item.title: 3.0 Hours of Monument Valley's Sunrise or Sunset 4×4 Tour
item.description: See the sites of Lower Monument Valley that even tour guides can’t get enough of on this 3-hour sunrise or sunset excursion. Guides custom create itineraries that feature their favorite points in the valley in addition to must-see formations, transporting you in an all-terrain vehicle to sites far off the beaten path.

image.alt: 3.0 Hours of Monument Valley's Sunrise or Sunset 4×4 Tour

item.title: Arches National Park Back Country Adventure from Moab
item.description: The tour will head north on US 191 passing the entrance of Arches National Park which was designated as a National Monument before being changed to a National Park in 1971. Our special use permit allows us to enter the back door to Arches via Willow Springs Road. Along this backcountry route, you'll travel through the new area of the "Utah Raptor State Park". Here where Native Americans lived back in history for thousands of years you'll see dinosaur tracks and enjoy the views of the La Sal Mountains. The Park lies atop an underground salt bed that is responsible for the arches, spires, and sandstone fins. Several of the stops include Eye of the Whale(Backcountry), Balanced Rock(Pavement), Sand Dune Arch(Pavement), Delicate Arche Viewpoint(Pavement), and the Windows Section(Pavement). The trip length is approximately 4 hours duration. All vehicles are Jeep Rubicons which are enclosed and air-conditioned.

image.alt: Arches National Park Back Country Adventure from Moab

item.title: Guided Hike through Peek-a-Boo Slot Canyon (Small Group)
item.description: Embark on an adventure off the beaten path in Zion National Park. This small-group guided hiking tour takes you to the Peek-A-Boo Slot Canyon, a serene spot of distinctive Navajo Sandstone rocks that have taken millions of years to form. Your guide will tell you all about the area's history and geology as you explore.

image.alt: Guided Hike through Peek-a-Boo Slot Canyon (Small Group)

item.title: Moab Rafting Afternoon Half-Day Trip
item.description: Get a taste of what eastern Utah has to offer and spend your afternoon rafting down the Colorado River in the Moab area on this exciting excursion. Take in the desert landscapes as you navigate rapids and paddle through red rock canyons, Castle Valley, and Fisher Towers. After a few hours on the water, feel rejuvenated and excited to explore the rest of Moab.

image.alt: Moab Rafting Afternoon Half-Day Trip

item.title: Sunset Tour of Monument Valley
item.description: See Monument Valley at its most spectacular: as it is lit up by the setting sun. This tour is led by a Navajo guide and takes you into the backcountry, to places that are normally off limits to visitors. As well as seeing the sights, you'll dive into Indigenous culture with a Navajo rug weaving demonstration and performances.

image.alt: Sunset Tour of Monument Valley

item.title: Monument Valley Extended Backcountry Tour
item.description: Discover the natural wonders of Monument Valley on a tour led by a Navajo guide, who shows you the top sites such as Big Hogan and John Ford's Point as well as additional places not covered in shorter tours. As you travel 28 miles (45 km) through the tribal park, you'll learn a bit about Navajo culture and legends, see where movies have been filmed, and visit a traditional hogan (dwelling) to watch a rug-weaving demonstration.

image.alt: Monument Valley Extended Backcountry Tour

item.title: Monument Valley Daytime Tour - 3 Hours - Navajo Spirit Tours
item.description: The only way to explore the inner workings of Monument Valley is with a Navajo guide—it also happens to be the best way. With this private tour, your born-and-raised guide will take you from fantastic buttes, spires, and mesas to natural arches, amphitheaters, and Anasazi petroglyphs. You’ll wander this sacred ground exploring its beauty, significance, history, and culture, walking away with a connection to the land that cannot be broken.

image.alt: Monument Valley Daytime Tour - 3 Hours - Navajo Spirit Tours

item.title: Monument Valley Backcountry Tour
item.description: This guided tour of Monument Valley promises a more rounded experience than most typical sightseeing tours. With a Navajo guide, you'll explore in the company of someone with deep knowledge of the land and culture. As well as seeing the famed landscapes, you'll experience a rug weaving demonstration, performances and a side to the valley that is usually off limits to most visitors.

image.alt: Monument Valley Backcountry Tour
